title: VLANs
extract: A VLAN is a group of devices on one or more LANs that are configured to communicate as if they were attached to the same wire, when in fact they are located on a number of different LAN segments. Because VLANs are based on logical instead of physical connections, they are extremely flexible.Feb 15, 2018

Because VLANs are based on logical instead of physical connections, they are extremely flexible.Feb 15, 2018
